description.db:para: This table is used for defining TCP connection profiles.

column.name: proto
column.description: Restrict this profile to a specific Marina.Rodeo supported protocol.

column.name: remote_addr
column.description: Remote network address in "ip[/prefix_length]" format, or the special values NULL or "any", which will both match any remote IPv4 or IPv6 address.

column.name: remote_port
column.description: Remote network port. A value of 0 will match any remote port.

column.name: local_addr
column.description: Local network address in "ip[/prefix_length]" format, or the special values NULL or "any", which will both match any of the Marina.Rodeo network listeners.

column.name: local_port
column.description: Local network port. A value of 0 will match any Marina.Rodeo listening port.

column.name: priority
column.description: By default, higher network prefix lengths will match first. The priority field can be used to override this behavior, with lower priority rules being attempted first.

column.name: attrs
column.description: A URI params string with various TCP-connection related flags or properties pertaining to specific Marina.Rodeo modules or areas of code.

column.name: connect_timeout
column.description: Time in milliseconds before an ongoing blocking TCP connect attempt is aborted. Default: 100 ms.

column.name: con_lifetime
column.description: Time in seconds with no READ or WRITE events on a TCP connection before it is destroyed. Default: 120 s.

column.name: msg_read_timeout
column.description: The maximum number of seconds that a complete SIP message is expected to arrive via TCP. Default: 4 s.

column.name: send_threshold
column.description: The maximum number of microseconds that sending a TCP request can take. Send latencies above this threshold will trigger a logging warning. A value of 0 disables the check. Default: 0 us.

column.name: no_new_conn
column.description: Set this to 1 in order to instruct Marina.Rodeo to never open connections to the "remote" side. This may be useful when there is a NAT firewall in-between, so only remote->local connections are possible. Default: 0.

column.name: alias_mode
column.description: Controls TCP connection reusage for requests in the opposite direction to the original one. 0 (never reuse), 1 (only reuse if RFC 5923 Via ";alias" is present), 2 (always reuse). Default: 0.

column.name: parallel_read
column.description: Set to 1 to re-balance a TCP connection for reading after a worker processes one packet. Set to 2 in order to have proto modules re-balance a TCP conn for reading before processing a fully read packet, but only if they have support for this (e.g. proto_tcp). Default: 0 (lock a connection in a TCP reader process for "tcp_con_lifetime" seconds at a time).

column.name: keepalive
column.description: Set to 0 in order to disable TCP keepalives at Operating System level. Default: 1 (enabled).

column.name: keepcount
column.description: Number of keepalives to send before closing the connection. Default: 9.

column.name: keepidle
column.description: Amount of time, in seconds, before Marina.Rodeo will start to send keepalives if the connection is idle. Default: 7200.

column.name: keepinterval
column.description: Interval in seconds between successive (failed) keepalive probes. Default: 75.
